channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: A neighbor called one day to say she was getting baby goats and we might hear them crying as they were being weaned from their mother. I asked why she was getting goats. She said she always wanted to have goats. Sometimes that's all there is to it.
@fozbaca I try never to have ulterior motives in conversation. The only reason I ask a question is if I want to know what people think.
How to edit RSS subscription lists in Drummer. https://t.co/hVe6yybr1Q

Two Game 7s in the NBA playoffs today. Uncle Davey will be watching the TV set. The two games mean different things, to me at least. Either way, in the first game, one very deserving team will move forward and another very deserving team will go home.
The other game will determine of future Hall of Famer Chris Paul will get another shot at the championship, or if he's forever banished to being a great player that never got there. There's no shame in that, he has lots of company.

Heather Cox Richardson's How The South Won The Civil War is another eye-opener. https://t.co/oKbbXBbLcA If you read it you will no longer be puzzled about why American politics still works the way it does. It hasn't changed as much as you think.
@fozbaca i wanted to know what people thought.
@wjmaggos another guy says it's an irrelevant question. you should think about this some more.
@fozbaca another guy says it's a silly question. you should think about this some more.

America has never, as far as I know, apologized to African-Americans for enslaving their ancestors, who it turns out weren't property and were our ancestors too, as Americans.
It's something we could take care of now, so we don't pass curse of not having resolved this on to future generations of Americans.

@nathanwallace @judell @steampipeio My use case is parallel with yours, providing a programmatic interface with SQL to a system of feeds. You're doing a much broader set of services, my focus is just on feeds. From your explanation I know understand better where you fit in. BTW, your product looks great.
@nathanwallace @judell @steampipeio Thanks for explaining. ;-)
This is a good point, except I don't know about Manchin saving them. He's pretty corrupt. https://t.co/FxFXuxsfce
When does life begin?
According to the IRS an unborn child is not a person. By the way the IRS is part of the US government. https://t.co/GEMPfJGczP

Somehow it Must be conveyed to the Repubs on the Supreme Court that their Roe decision, as leaked, will end the Supreme Court and throw the country into chaos. Itâ€™s hard to imagine how much death there will be. They should back off.
